opennlp.ccg.parse.supertagger
Class WordAndPOSDictionaryLabellingStrategy

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.parse.supertagger.WordAndPOSDictionaryLabellingStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
SupertaggerAdapter, Supertagger, LabellingStrategy
public class WordAndPOSDictionaryLabellingStrategy
extends Object
implements LabellingStrategy, Supertagger

A `labelling strategy' for a CCG supertagger that restricts the output of the model based on word and POS `tagging dictionaries' in the following way: if a word w occurs at least K times in training, the model's output is constrained to the outcomes seen with w during training. If w did not occur at least K times during training, the model's output is constrained to the outcomes seen with w's POS tag during training. In the off chance that the POS tag was not seen in training, the model's best prediction is used.

Version:
$Revision: 1.22 $, $Date: 2011/03/22 03:20:25 $
Author:
Dennis N. Mehay

multitag

public List<String> multitag(Word w,
                             Collection<Pair<String,Double>> context,
                             double beta)
A method that returns all labels given by the model that both (1) are assigned probability `p' s.t.: p>=(`beta'*), where `beta' is a factor passed in by the client of this method and where is the probability of the most probably outcome of the model and (2) (if the word (obtained from the String[] `context') has occured at least K times in training) are in the STTaggerWordDictionary under the entry for said word. If the word did not occur at least K times in training, the output set is constrained by a STTaggerPOSDictionary. In the off chance that a POS did not occur in the training data, the models predictions themselves are submitted to the `beta constraint'.

Specified by:
multitag in interface LabellingStrategy
Parameters:
context - A String[] of contextual predicates (in the maximum entropy modelling sense)
mo - A MaxentModel.
beta - A double specifying how close in probability all returned outcomes must be.
Returns:
An ArrayList of labels that meet the above constraints.

multitagWithScores

public List<Pair<Double,String>> multitagWithScores(Word thisWord,
                                                    Collection<Pair<String,Double>> context,
                                                    double beta)
A method to return the set of labels that are greater than or equal to the best label multiplied by a factor `beta', given a model and a String[] of contextual predicates.

Specified by:
multitagWithScores in interface LabellingStrategy
Parameters:
thisWord - a opennlp.ccg.lexicon.Word representing the current word being tagged.
context - A Collection> of contextual predicates (in the maximum entropy modelling sense) with their corresponding activations (real-valued, hence the Double).
model - A model for generating the base predictions.
beta - A positive double specifying how close to the best label each label returned must be.
Returns:
An ArrayList> of the outcomes {o: score(o)>=[beta * score(bestLabel)]}.
